text: Angelina Mango (; born 10 April 2001) is an Italian singer-songwriter. == Career == In 2023, she was the runner-up of the Italian talent show and won the show's singing category. In 2024, she won the Sanremo Music Festival with the song "La noia". She represented Italy at the Eurovision Song Contest 2024 with the same song and finished 7th. == Personal life == Angelina Mango is the daughter of the musicians (from the music group ) and Giuseppe
